trans-unit.source: Sets the body pickable with rays if enabled is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置 enabled 可以用射线拾取的身体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the body’s velocity on the given axis. The velocity in the given vector axis will be set as the given vector length. This is useful for jumping behavior.
trans-unit.target: 设置物体在给定轴上的速度。给定矢量轴上的速度将设置为给定矢量长度。这对于跳跃行为很有用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bone weights of given vertex.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定顶点的骨重。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bones of given vertex.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定顶点的骨骼。

trans-unit.source: Sets the camera projection to orthogonal mode, by specifying a width and the near and far clip planes in worldspace units. (As a hint, 2D games often use this projection, with values specified in pixels)
trans-unit.target: 通过以世界空间单位指定宽度以及近和远裁剪平面，将相机投影设置为正交模式。（作为提示，二维游戏通常使用此投影，其值以像素为单位）

trans-unit.source: Sets the camera projection to perspective mode, by specifying a FOV Y angle in degrees (FOV means Field of View), and the near and far clip planes in worldspace units.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定以度为单位的FOV Y角度（FOV表示视场）以及世界空间单位中的近和远裁剪平面，将相机投影设置为透视模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the canvas light’s Transform2D.
trans-unit.target: 设置画布灯的Transform2D。

trans-unit.source: Sets the canvas light’s shadow’s filter, see CANVAS_LIGHT_SHADOW_FILTER_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 设置画布灯光阴影的滤镜，请参见CANVAS_LIGHT_SHADOW_FILTER_ *常量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clear mode of a viewport. See ViewportClearMode for options.
trans-unit.target: 设置视口的清除模式。有关选项，请参见ViewportClearMode。

trans-unit.source: Sets the collision shape’s shape to the addition of all its convexed MeshInstance siblings geometry.
trans-unit.target: 将碰撞形状的形状设置为其所有凸出的MeshInstance兄弟姐妹几何形状的和。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color for a light.
trans-unit.target: 设置灯光的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color of given vertex.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定顶点的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color of the border.
trans-unit.target: 设置边框的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color of the canvas light’s shadow.
trans-unit.target: 设置画布灯光阴影的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color of the ramp color at index point
trans-unit.target: 设置索引点处的渐变颜色

trans-unit.source: Sets the color that modulates the CanvasItem and its children.
trans-unit.target: 设置调制CanvasItem及其子级的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color that modulates the CanvasItem without children.
trans-unit.target: 设置可调节CanvasItem的颜色（不带子级）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the continuous collision detection mode using one of the CCDMode constants.
trans-unit.target: 使用CCDMode常量之一设置连续碰撞检测模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the debug draw mode of a viewport. See ViewportDebugDraw for options.
trans-unit.target: 设置视口的调试绘制模式。有关选项，请参见ViewportDebugDraw。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default column width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认的列宽,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default cursor shape to be used in the viewport instead of CURSOR_ARROW.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在视口中使用的默认光标形状，而不是CURSOR_ARROW。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default icon size in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认的图标大小,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default position of the icon to either ICON_MODE_LEFT or ICON_MODE_TOP.
trans-unit.target: 将图标的默认位置设置为ICON_MODE_LEFT或ICON_MODE_TOP。

trans-unit.source: Sets the delay time for the submenu item to popup on mouse hovering. If the popup menu is added as a child of another (acting as a submenu), it will inherit the delay time of the parent menu item. Default value: 0.3 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 设置子菜单项在鼠标悬停时弹出的延迟时间。如果将弹出菜单添加为另一个菜单的子菜单（充当子菜单），它将继承父菜单项的延迟时间。默认值： 0.3 秒。

trans-unit.source: Sets the device at index from the list of discovered devices to device.
trans-unit.target: 设置在设备 index 从已发现的设备列表 device 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the distance from which the ‘out_of_range_mode’ takes effect. Has no effect if set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置“ out_of_range_mode”生效的距离。如果设置为0，则无效。

trans-unit.source: Sets the draw offset of the graph. Used for display in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 设置图形的绘制偏移。用于编辑器中的显示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drawing index of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定坐标的图集/自变量中子tile的绘图索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the enabled status of a plugin. The plugin name is the same as its directory name.
trans-unit.target: 设置插件的启用状态。插件名称与其目录名称相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fallback font at index idx.
trans-unit.target: 将后备字体设置为索引 idx 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the folded state of the node in the Scene dock.

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color of the item specified by idx index to the specified Color.
trans-unit.target: 将 idx index 指定的项目的前景色设置为指定的Color。

trans-unit.source: Sets the function to call when any body/area enters or exits the area. This callback will be called for any object interacting with the area, and takes five parameters:
trans-unit.target: 设置当任何物体/区域进入或离开区域时要调用的函数。任何与区域交互的对象都会调用这个回调函数,需要五个参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the function used to calculate physics for an object, if that object allows it (see body_set_omit_force_integration).
trans-unit.target: 设置用于计算对象物理的函数（如果该对象允许的话）（请参见body_set_omit_force_integration）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the function used to calculate physics for an object, if that object allows it (see body_set_omit_force_integration).
trans-unit.target: 设置用于计算对象物理的函数（如果该对象允许的话）（请参见body_set_omit_force_integration）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the game’s icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置游戏的图标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given property to value on all members of the given group, respecting the given GroupCallFlags.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的 property 到 value 在给定组的所有成员，尊重给出GroupCallFlags。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given property to value on all members of the given group.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的 property 到 value 在给定组的所有成员。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given collision layer bit.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的碰撞层位。

trans-unit.target: 设置给定的碰撞掩码位。

trans-unit.target: 将索引 button_idx 处给定列的按钮Texture 设置为 button 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given column’s cell mode to mode. See CELL_MODE_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 将给定列的单元格模式设置为 mode 。请参见 CELL_MODE_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given column’s custom background color and whether to just use it as an outline.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定列的自定义背景色，以及是否仅将其用作轮廓。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given column’s custom color.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定列的自定义颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given column’s custom draw callback to callback method on object.
trans-unit.target: 将给定列的自定义绘制回调设置为 object 的 callback 方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given column’s icon Texture.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定列的图标Texture。

trans-unit.target: 设置给定列图标的最大宽度。

trans-unit.target: 设置给定列的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.target: 将给定的节点设置为图形的端点。

trans-unit.target: 将给定的节点设置为图形的起始点。

trans-unit.source: Sets the icon size to its initial size multiplied by the specified scale. Default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 将图标大小设置为初始大小乘以指定的比例。默认值为1.0。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index for the CanvasItem.
trans-unit.target: 设置CanvasItem的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the interpolation to the given time in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 将插值设置为给定 time 以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.target: 将 index 点的左 TangentMode 设置为 mode 。

trans-unit.target: 将 index tangent 的点的左切角设置为tangent。

trans-unit.target: 设置给定坐标的图集/自变量的子tile的遮光板。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale of the game.

trans-unit.source: Sets the main window width. On desktop platforms, this is the default window size. Stretch mode settings use this also as a reference when enabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置主窗口宽度。在桌面平台上,这是默认的窗口大小。启用拉伸模式后,拉伸模式设置也将此作为参考。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum columns the list will have.

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum contacts to report. Bodies can keep a log of the contacts with other bodies, this is enabled by setting the maximum amount of contacts reported to a number greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置要报告的最大联系人数。机构可以保存与其他机构的联系记录,通过将报告的最大联系数量设置为大于0的数字来启用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the meta data associated with given vertex.
trans-unit.target: 设置与给定顶点相关的元数据。

trans-unit.target: 设置给定边缘的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Sets the meta data of given face.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定面的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Sets the metadata of an item, which might be of any type. You can later get it with get_item_metadata, which provides a simple way of assigning context data to items.
trans-unit.target: 设置项目的元数据，该元数据可以是任何类型。您稍后可以使用get_item_metadata获得它，它提供了一种将上下文数据分配给项目的简单方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum width of a column. Columns that have the “Expand” flag will use their “min_width” in a similar fashion to Control.size_flags_stretch_ratio.
trans-unit.target: 设置列的最小宽度。具有“ Expand”标志的列将以与Control.size_flags_stretch_ratio相似的方式使用其“ min_width” 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the mouse position to the specified vector.
trans-unit.target: 将鼠标位置设置为指定的向量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the bus at index bus_idx to name.
trans-unit.target: 将索引为 bus_idx 的总线的名称设置为 name 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前线程的名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the navigation polygon of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 从给定坐标的地图册/autotile中设置子tile的导航多边形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the node to move toward and orient with.
trans-unit.target: 设置节点的移动方向和方向。

trans-unit.source: Sets the node’s coordinates. Used for display in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 设置节点的坐标。用于在编辑器中显示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the node’s network master to the peer with the given peer ID. The network master is the peer that has authority over the node on the network. Useful in conjunction with the master and puppet keywords. Inherited from the parent node by default, which ultimately defaults to peer ID 1 (the server). If recursive, the given peer is recursively set as the master for all children of this node.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的网络主节点设置为具有给定对等ID的对等节点。网络主控方是对网络上的节点具有权限的对等方。与 master 和 puppet 关键字结合使用。默认情况下是从父节点继承的，该父节点最终默认为对等ID 1（服务器）。如果是 recursive ，则将给定对等方递归设置为该节点所有子级的主节点。

trans-unit.source: Sets the node’s priority in the execution order of the enabled processing callbacks (i.e. NOTIFICATION_PROCESS, NOTIFICATION_PHYSICS_PROCESS and their internal counterparts). Nodes with a higher process priority will have their processing callbacks executed first.
trans-unit.target: 按照启用的处理回调的执行顺序设置节点的优先级（即NOTIFICATION_PROCESS，NOTIFICATION_PHYSICS_PROCESS及其内部对应对象）。具有较高进程优先级的节点将首先执行其处理回调。

trans-unit.target: 设置从 0.5 开始的偏移量

trans-unit.source: Sets the order of a configuration value (influences when saved to the config file).

trans-unit.target: 设置资源的路径，可能会覆盖该路径的现有缓存条目。这与设置resource_path不同，因为如果已经为给定路径缓存了另一个资源，则后者会出错。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position for the point with the given id.

trans-unit.target: 显示给定类型的游戏所加载的资源数量。

trans-unit.source: Shows the virtual keyboard if the platform has one. The existing_text parameter is useful for implementing your own LineEdit, as it tells the virtual keyboard what text has already been typed (the virtual keyboard uses it for auto-correct and predictions).
trans-unit.target: 如果平台有一个，则显示虚拟键盘。该existing_text参数是为实现自己的LineEdit有用，因为它告诉已经输入（虚拟键盘使用它进行自动校正和预测）什么文本虚拟键盘。

trans-unit.source: Shrinks Vertex array by creating an index array. Avoids reusing Vertices.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建一个索引数组来缩小顶点数组。避免重复使用顶点。

trans-unit.source: Shrinks the image by a factor of 2.
trans-unit.target: 将图像缩小2倍。

trans-unit.source: Shuffles the array such that the items will have a random order. This method uses the global random number generator common to methods such as @GDScript.randi. Call @GDScript.randomize to ensure that a new seed will be used each time if you want non-reproducible shuffling.
trans-unit.target: 随机排列数组，使项目具有随机顺序。此方法使用@ GDScript.randi之类的方法通用的全局随机数生成器。调用@ GDScript.randomize以确保每次要使用不可重复的改组时都将使用新的种子。

trans-unit.source: Sidechained. Sidechained, which can reduce the sound level sidechained with another audio bus for threshold detection.. This technique is very common in video game mixing to download the level of Music/SFX while voices are being heard.
trans-unit.target: 侧链式。Sidechained,它可以降低声音水平侧链与另一个音频总线的阈值检测。这种技术在视频游戏混音中非常常见,可以在听到声音的同时下载音乐/FX的电平。

trans-unit.source: Signal send when a new interface has been added.
trans-unit.target: 当有新的接口加入时发出信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal send when a new tracker has been added. If you don’t use a fixed number of controllers or if you’re using ARVRAnchors for an AR solution it is important to react to this signal and add the appropriate ARVRController or ARVRAnchor node related to this new tracker.
trans-unit.target: 添加新的跟踪器后发送信号。如果您不使用固定数量的控制器，或者您将ARVRAnchors用于AR解决方案，则必须对此信号做出反应并添加与此新跟踪器相关的适当的ARVRController或ARVRAnchor节点，这一点很重要。

trans-unit.source: Signal send when a tracker is removed, you should remove any ARVRController or ARVRAnchor points if applicable. This is not mandatory, the nodes simply become inactive and will be made active again when a new tracker becomes available (i.e. a new controller is switched on that takes the place of the previous one).
trans-unit.target: 信号发送当一个跟踪器被移除时,你应该移除任何ARVRController或ARVRAnchor点(如果适用)。这不是强制性的,节点只是变得不活跃,当有新的跟踪器可用时(即开启了新的控制器,取代了之前的控制器),节点将再次变得活跃。

trans-unit.source: Skeleton provides a hierarchical interface for managing bones, including pose, rest and animation (see Animation). Skeleton will support rag doll dynamics in the future.

trans-unit.source: Slows down the vehicle by applying a braking force. The vehicle is only slowed down if the wheels are in contact with a surface. The force you need to apply to adequately slow down your vehicle depends on the RigidBody.mass of the vehicle. For a vehicle with a mass set to 1000, try a value in the 25 - 30 range for hard braking.
trans-unit.target: 通过施加制动力使车辆减速。仅当车轮与地面接触时，车辆才会减速。充分减速车辆所需的力取决于车辆的RigidBody.mass。对于质量设置为1000的车辆，请尝试在25到30范围内的值进行硬制动。

trans-unit.source: So say that your character is driving a car, the ARVROrigin node should be a child node of this car. If you implement a teleport system to move your character, you change the position of this node. Etc.
trans-unit.target: 所以说你的角色在开一辆车,ARVROrigin节点应该是这辆车的一个子节点。如果你实现了一个传送系统来移动你的角色,你就会改变这个节点的位置。等等。

trans-unit.source: Soft clipping starts to reduce the peaks a little below the threshold level and progressively increases its effect as the input level increases such that the threshold is never exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 软削波开始将峰值降低到阈值水平以下一点,并随着输入电平的增加而逐渐增加其效果,从而使其永远不会超过阈值。

trans-unit.source: Some classes that extend Object add memory management. This is the case of Reference, which counts references and deletes itself automatically when no longer referenced. Node, another fundamental type, deletes all its children when freed from memory.
trans-unit.target: 一些扩展对象的类增加了内存管理。Reference就是这种情况，它对引用进行计数并在不再引用时自动删除自身。另一个基本类型Node在从内存中释放时会删除其所有子级。

trans-unit.source: Some of this material’s properties are applied to each particle when emitted, while others can have a CurveTexture applied to vary values over the lifetime of the particle.
trans-unit.target: 该材料的某些特性在发射时会应用于每个粒子，而其他材质可以应用CurveTexture来在粒子的整个生命周期内改变值。

trans-unit.source: Sort all child nodes based on their Y positions. The child node must inherit from CanvasItem for it to be sorted. Nodes that have a higher Y position will be drawn later, so they will appear on top of nodes that have a lower Y position.
trans-unit.target: 根据所有子节点的Y位置对它们进行排序。子节点必须继承自CanvasItem才能对其进行排序。Y位置较高的节点将在以后绘制，因此它们将显示在Y位置较低的节点的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the array using a custom method. The arguments are an object that holds the method and the name of such method. The custom method receives two arguments (a pair of elements from the array) and must return true if the first argument is less than the second, and return false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义方法对数组进行排序。参数是一个保存方法及其名称的对象。自定义方法接收两个参数（数组中的一对元素），并且如果第一个参数小于第二个参数，则必须返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.target: 启动一个新 Thread ，该线程以“ userdata”作为参数传递给对象“ instance”上的“ method”。可以通过传递PRIORITY_ *枚举来更改 Thread 的“优先级” 。

trans-unit.source: Starts to vibrate the joypad. Joypads usually come with two rumble motors, a strong and a weak one. weak_magnitude is the strength of the weak motor (between 0 and 1) and strong_magnitude is the strength of the strong motor (between 0 and 1). duration is the duration of the effect in seconds (a duration of 0 will try to play the vibration indefinitely).
trans-unit.target: 开始震动欢乐板。弱_幅度是指弱电机的强度(在0和1之间),强_幅度是指强电机的强度(在0和1之间)。持续时间是指效果的持续时间,以秒为单位(持续时间为0将尝试无限期播放振动)。

trans-unit.source: Stores multi-touch press/release information. Supports touch press, touch release and index for multi-touch count and order.

trans-unit.source: Stores position, muting, solo, bypass, effects, effect position, volume, and the connections between buses. See AudioServer for usage.

trans-unit.source: Stores the given String as a line in the file in Pascal format (i.e. also store the length of the string).

trans-unit.source: StyleBox
trans-unit.target: StyleBox

trans-unit.source: StyleBox is Resource that provides an abstract base class for drawing stylized boxes for the UI. StyleBoxes are used for drawing the styles of buttons, line edit backgrounds, tree backgrounds, etc. and also for testing a transparency mask for pointer signals. If mask test fails on a StyleBox assigned as mask to a control, clicks and motion signals will go through it to the one below.
trans-unit.target: StyleBox是Resource，它提供一个抽象基类来为UI绘制样式化的框。StyleBox用于绘制按钮，线条编辑背景，树背景等的样式，还用于测试指针信号的透明蒙版。如果在分配给控件的StyleBox上进行遮罩测试失败，则单击和动作信号将通过它到达下面的控件。

trans-unit.source: Substitutes a given area shape by another. The old shape is selected by its index, the new one by its RID.

trans-unit.target: 用另一个替换给定的身体形状。旧形状通过其索引选择，新形状通过其RID选择。

trans-unit.source: Supported color names:
trans-unit.target: 支持的颜色名称。

trans-unit.source: Surface reflection. A value of 0 represents a perfect mirror while a value of 1 completely blurs the reflection. See also metallic.
trans-unit.target: 表面反射。值 0 代表完美的镜子，而值 1 则完全使反射模糊。另请参阅金属。

trans-unit.source: SurfaceTool
trans-unit.target: SurfaceTool

trans-unit.source: Surfaces are created to be rendered using a “primitive”, which may be PRIMITIVE_POINTS, PRIMITIVE_LINES, PRIMITIVE_LINE_STRIP, PRIMITIVE_LINE_LOOP, PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLES, PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE_STRIP, PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE_FAN. See Mesh for details. (As a note, when using indices, it is recommended to only use points, lines or triangles). Mesh.get_surface_count will become the surf_idx for this new surface.
trans-unit.target: 使用“图元”创建要渲染的表面，可以是PRIMITIVE_POINTS，PRIMITIVE_LINES，PRIMITIVE_LINE_STRIP，PRIMITIVE_LINE_LOOP，PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLES，PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE_STRIP，PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE_FAN。有关详细信息，请参见网格。（注意，使用索引时，建议仅使用点，线或三角形）。Mesh.get_surface_count surf_idx 为此新曲面的surf_idx。

trans-unit.target: 切向加速度随机率。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: Tells Godot which node it should give keyboard focus to if the user presses Shift+Tab on a keyboard by default. You can change the key by editing the ui_focus_prev input action.
trans-unit.target: 告诉Godot，如果用户默认情况下按键盘上的Shift + Tab键，则应将焦点移至哪个节点。您可以通过编辑 ui_focus_prev 输入操作来更改键。

trans-unit.source: Tells Godot which node it should give keyboard focus to if the user presses Tab on a keyboard by default. You can change the key by editing the ui_focus_next input action.
trans-unit.target: 告诉Godot，如果用户默认情况下按键盘上的Tab键，则应将焦点对准哪个节点。您可以通过编辑 ui_focus_next 输入操作来更改键。

trans-unit.source: Tells Godot which node it should give keyboard focus to if the user presses the down arrow on the keyboard or down on a gamepad by default. You can change the key by editing the ui_down input action. The node must be a Control. If this property is not set, Godot will give focus to the closest Control to the bottom of this one.
trans-unit.target: 告诉Godot，默认情况下，如果用户按下键盘上的向下箭头或游戏手柄上的向下箭头，则应该将焦点对准哪个节点。您可以通过编辑 ui_down 输入操作来更改键。该节点必须是 Control 。如果未设置此属性，则Godot会将焦点集中在该 Control 底部最接近的控件上。

trans-unit.source: Tells Godot which node it should give keyboard focus to if the user presses the left arrow on the keyboard or left on a gamepad by default. You can change the key by editing the ui_left input action. The node must be a Control. If this property is not set, Godot will give focus to the closest Control to the left of this one.
trans-unit.target: 告诉Godot，默认情况下，如果用户按下键盘上的向左箭头或游戏手柄上的向左键，应该将焦点对准哪个节点。您可以通过编辑 ui_left 输入操作来更改键。该节点必须是 Control 。如果未设置此属性，则Godot会将焦点放在该 Control 左侧最接近的Control上。

trans-unit.source: Tells Godot which node it should give keyboard focus to if the user presses the right arrow on the keyboard or right on a gamepad by default. You can change the key by editing the ui_right input action. The node must be a Control. If this property is not set, Godot will give focus to the closest Control to the bottom of this one.
trans-unit.target: 告诉Godot，默认情况下，如果用户按下键盘上的向右箭头或游戏手柄上的向右箭头，则应将焦点对准哪个节点。您可以通过编辑 ui_right 输入操作来更改键。该节点必须是 Control 。如果未设置此属性，则Godot会将焦点集中在该 Control 底部最接近的控件上。

trans-unit.source: Tells Godot which node it should give keyboard focus to if the user presses the top arrow on the keyboard or top on a gamepad by default. You can change the key by editing the ui_top input action. The node must be a Control. If this property is not set, Godot will give focus to the closest Control to the bottom of this one.
trans-unit.target: 告诉Godot默认情况下，如果用户按下键盘上的顶部箭头或游戏手柄上的顶部，则应该将焦点对准哪个节点。您可以通过编辑 ui_top 输入操作来更改键。该节点必须是 Control 。如果未设置此属性，则Godot会将焦点集中在该 Control 底部最接近的控件上。

trans-unit.source: Tells the parent Container nodes how they should resize and place the node on the X axis. Use one of the SIZE_* constants to change the flags. See the constants to learn what each does.
trans-unit.target: 告诉父容器节点如何调整其尺寸并将其放置在X轴上。使用 SIZE_* 常量之一来更改标志。查看常数以了解每个常数。

trans-unit.source: Tells the parent Container nodes how they should resize and place the node on the Y axis. Use one of the SIZE_* constants to change the flags. See the constants to learn what each does.
trans-unit.target: 告诉父容器节点如何调整其尺寸并将其放置在Y轴上。使用 SIZE_* 常量之一来更改标志。查看常数以了解每个常数。

trans-unit.source: Tells which resource class this loader can load. Note that custom resource types defined by scripts aren’t known by the ClassDB, so you might just handle "Resource" for them.
trans-unit.target: 告诉此加载程序可以加载哪个资源类。请注意，由脚本定义的自定义资源类型对于ClassDB是未知的，因此您可以为它们处理 "Resource" 。

trans-unit.source: Terminates the current tag. Use after push_* methods to close bbcodes manually. Does not need to follow add_* methods.
trans-unit.target: 终止当前标签。在 push_* 方法之后使用可手动关闭bbcode。不需要遵循 add_* 方法。

trans-unit.source: Test a position in a rectangle, return whether it passes the mask test.
trans-unit.target: 测试矩形中的一个位置,返回是否通过遮罩测试。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the 3d ray starting at from with the direction of dir intersects the triangle specified by a, b and c. If yes, returns the point of intersection as Vector3. If no intersection takes place, an empty Variant is returned.
trans-unit.target: 测试 from dir 方向开始的3d射线是否与 a ， b 和 c 指定的三角形相交。如果是，则将相交点返回为Vector3。如果没有交叉，则返回一个空的Variant。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the segment (from, to) intersects the triangle a, b, c. If yes, returns the point of intersection as Vector3. If no intersection takes place, an empty Variant is returned.
trans-unit.target: 测试线段（ from ， to ）是否与三角形 a ， b ， c 相交。如果是，则将相交点返回为Vector3。如果没有交叉，则返回一个空的Variant。

trans-unit.source: Text alignment as defined in the ALIGN_* enum.
trans-unit.target: 在ALIGN_*枚举中定义的文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.target: 基于纹理的3x3缩放风格。这个样式框对一个纹理进行3x3缩放,其中只有中心单元格是完全拉伸的。这允许轻松创建边框样式。

trans-unit.target: 多边形每个顶点的纹理坐标。每个多边形顶点应有一个 uv 。如果更少，则未定义的顶点将使用 (0, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: Texture for 2D and 3D.
trans-unit.target: 2D和3D的纹理。

trans-unit.source: Texture to display by default, when the node is not in the disabled, focused, hover or pressed state.
trans-unit.target: 当节点未处于禁用，聚焦，悬停或按下状态时，默认显示的纹理。

trans-unit.source: Texture to display on mouse down over the node, if the node has keyboard focus and the player presses the enter key or if the player presses the BaseButton.shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点具有键盘焦点并且播放器按Enter键，或者如果播放器按BaseButton.shortcut键，则在鼠标向下显示在节点上的纹理。

trans-unit.source: Texture to display when the node has mouse or keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 当节点有鼠标或键盘焦点时要显示的纹理。

trans-unit.target: 禁用节点时显示的纹理。参见BaseButton.disabled。

trans-unit.target: 基于纹理的按钮。支持按下、悬停、禁用和聚焦状态。

trans-unit.target: 由MeshInstance2D绘制的网格。

trans-unit.target: 用于每个粒子的网格。如果为 null ，则粒子将是球体。

trans-unit.source: The MeshLibrary item index located at the grid-based X, Y and Z coordinates. If the cell is empty, INVALID_CELL_ITEM will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 该MeshLibrary位于基于网格的X，Y，Z坐标项指标。如果单元格为空，将返回INVALID_CELL_ITEM。

trans-unit.source: The MultiMesh resource that will be used and shared among all instances of the MultiMeshInstance.
trans-unit.target: 该MultiMesh将使用和共享的所有实例之间的资源 MultiMeshInstance 。

trans-unit.source: The MultiplayerAPI instance associated with this node. Either the custom_multiplayer, or the default SceneTree one (if inside tree).
trans-unit.target: 与此节点关联的MultiplayerAPI实例。无论是custom_multiplayer，或默认SceneTree一个（如果里面的树）。

trans-unit.source: The NodePath to the remote node, relative to the RemoteTransform’s position in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 相对于场景中RemoteTransform位置的远程节点的NodePath。

trans-unit.target: 存储在此EncodedObjectAsID实例中的对象标识符。可以使用@ GDScript.instance_from_id检索对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The OccluderPolygon2D used to compute the shadow.
trans-unit.target: 该OccluderPolygon2D用于计算阴影。

trans-unit.source: The OpenSimplexNoise instance used to generate the noise.
trans-unit.target: 该OpenSimplexNoise例如用来产生的噪音。

trans-unit.source: The Resource to load.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的资源。

trans-unit.source: The RID of the queried shape. See set_shape also.
trans-unit.target: 查询形状的RID。另请参见set_shape。

trans-unit.source: The RID of this world’s canvas resource. Used by the VisualServer for 2D drawing.
trans-unit.target: 这个世界的画布资源的RID。由VisualServer用于2D绘图。

trans-unit.source: The RID of this world’s physics space resource. Used by the Physics2DServer for 2D physics, treating it as both a space and an area.
trans-unit.target: 这个世界物理空间资源的RID。由Physics2DServer用于2D物理，将其视为空间和区域。

trans-unit.source: The Shader program used to render this material.
trans-unit.target: 用于渲染此材质的Shader程序。

trans-unit.source: The Shape object containing the path along which we extrude when mode is MODE_PATH.
trans-unit.target: 的形状包含沿其当我们挤出路径对象模式是MODE_PATH。

trans-unit.source: The SpatialGizmo for this node. Used for example in EditorSpatialGizmo as custom visualization and editing handles in Editor.
trans-unit.target: 此节点的SpatialGizmo。例如，在EditorSpatialGizmo中用作自定义可视化和Editor中的编辑句柄。

trans-unit.source: The SpriteFrames resource containing the animation(s).
trans-unit.target: 包含动画的SpriteFrames资源。

trans-unit.source: The Texture that will be used if using the default CanvasItemMaterial. Can be accessed as TEXTURE in CanvasItem shader.
trans-unit.target: 该纹理，将如果使用的是默认使用CanvasItemMaterial。可以在CanvasItem着色器中作为 TEXTURE 访问。

trans-unit.source: The ArrayMesh is used to construct a Mesh by specifying the attributes as arrays. The most basic example is the creation of a single triangle
trans-unit.target: 所述 ArrayMesh 用于构造一个网格通过指定的属性阵列。最基本的示例是创建单个三角形

trans-unit.source: The CubeMap’s storage mode. See STORAGE_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 该 CubeMap 的存储模式。请参阅 STORAGE_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: The Engine class allows you to query and modify the game’s run-time parameters, such as frames per second, time scale, and others.
trans-unit.target: 该 Engine 类允许您查询和修改游戏的运行时的参数，如每秒帧数，时间尺度，和其他人。

trans-unit.source: The MeshInstance is ready to be added to the SceneTree to be shown.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MeshInstance 准备被添加到SceneTree上显示。

trans-unit.source: The SceneTree’s root Viewport.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SceneTree 的根视口。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptCreateDialog creates script files according to a given template for a given scripting language. The standard use is to configure its fields prior to calling one of the Popup.popup methods.
trans-unit.target: 该 ScriptCreateDialog 根据对于给定的脚本语言给定的模板创建脚本文件。标准用法是在调用Popup.popup方法之一之前配置其字段。

trans-unit.source: The SurfaceTool is used to construct a Mesh by specifying vertex attributes individually. It can be used to construct a Mesh from script. All properties except index need to be added before a call to add_vertex. For example adding vertex colors and UVs looks like
trans-unit.target: 所述 SurfaceTool 用于构造一个网格通过单独指定顶点属性。它可以用于从脚本构造网格。在调用add_vertex之前，需要添加除index之外的所有属性。例如添加顶点颜色和UV看起来像

trans-unit.source: The SurfaceTool now contains one vertex of a triangle which has a UV coordinate and a specified Color. If another vertex were added without calls to add_uv or add_color then the last values would be used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SurfaceTool 现在包含具有UV坐标三角形和指定的一个顶点的颜色。如果在不调用add_uv或add_color的情况下添加了另一个顶点，则将使用最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: The WorldEnvironment allows the user to specify default lighting parameters (e.g. ambient lighting), various post-processing effects (e.g. SSAO, DOF, Tonemapping), and how to draw the background (e.g. solid color, skybox). Usually, these are added in order to improve the realism/color balance of the scene.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WorldEnvironment 允许用户指定默认照明参数（例如环境照明），各种后处理效果（例如SSAO，DOF，色调映射），以及如何绘制背景（例如纯色，天空盒）。通常，添加这些是为了改善场景的真实感/色彩平衡。

trans-unit.source: The WorldEnvironment node is used to configure the default Environment for the scene.
trans-unit.target: 该 WorldEnvironment 节点用来配置默认环境的场景。

trans-unit.source: The arrays argument is an array of arrays. See ArrayType for the values used in this array. For example, arrays[0] is the array of vertices. That first vertex sub-array is always required; the others are optional. Adding an index array puts this function into “index mode” where the vertex and other arrays become the sources of data and the index array defines the vertex order. All sub-arrays must have the same length as the vertex array or be empty, except for ARRAY_INDEX if it is used.
trans-unit.target: 的 arrays 参数是数组的数组。有关此数组中使用的值，请参见ArrayType。例如， arrays[0] 是顶点的数组。始终需要第一个顶点子数组；其他是可选的。添加索引数组会使此函数进入“索引模式”，其中顶点和其他数组成为数据源，而索引数组定义了顶点顺序。除了使用ARRAY_INDEX之外，所有子数组的长度必须与顶点数组相同或为空。

trans-unit.source: The callback should accept two arguments: the TreeItem that is drawn and its position and size as a Rect2.
trans-unit.target: 该 callback 应该接受两个参数：TreeItem被吸入其位置和大小作为RECT2。

trans-unit.source: The curve rendered onto the texture.
trans-unit.target: 所述 curve 呈现到纹理。

trans-unit.source: The flags bitmask can be specified to customize the save behavior.
trans-unit.target: 该 flags 位掩码可以指定自定义保存行为。

trans-unit.source: The hex value is encoded as follows, from left to right: one byte for the major, one byte for the minor, one byte for the patch version. For example, “3.1.12” would be 0x03010C. Note that it’s still an int internally, and printing it will give you its decimal representation, which is not particularly meaningful. Use hexadecimal literals for easy version comparisons from code:
trans-unit.target: 该 hex 值编码如下，从左至右依次为：一个字节为各大，一个字节为未成年人，对补丁版本一个字节。例如，“ 3.1.12”将是 0x03010C 。请注意，它在内部仍然是int，打印出来会得到十进制表示，这没有特别的意义。使用十六进制文字从代码中轻松进行版本比较：

trans-unit.source: The id can be one of: TARGET_PEER_BROADCAST to send to all connected peers, TARGET_PEER_SERVER to send to the peer acting as server, a valid peer ID to send to that specific peer, a negative peer ID to send to all peers except that one. Default: TARGET_PEER_BROADCAST
trans-unit.target: 该 id 可以是以下之一：TARGET_PEER_BROADCAST发送给所有连接的对等方，TARGET_PEER_SERVER发送给充当服务器的对等方，一个有效的对等方ID发送给该特定对等方，负的对等方ID发送给除该方以外的所有对等方。默认值：TARGET_PEER_BROADCAST

trans-unit.source: The idx argument used to query connection metadata in other get_connection_* methods in the interval [0, get_connection_count() - 1].
trans-unit.target: 在间隔 [0, get_connection_count() - 1] 用于查询其他 get_connection_* 方法中的连接元数据的 idx 参数。

trans-unit.source: The idx argument used to query node data in other get_node_* methods in the interval [0, get_node_count() - 1].
trans-unit.target: 的 idx 用来查询节点数据中的其他参数 get_node_* 在间隔方法 [0, get_node_count() - 1] 。

trans-unit.source: The inputs array contains the values of the input ports.
trans-unit.target: 的 inputs 数组包含输入端口的值。

trans-unit.source: The new method of a script subclass creates a new instance. Object.set_script extends an existing object, if that object’s class matches one of the script’s base classes.
trans-unit.target: 脚本子类的 new 方法将创建一个新实例。如果该对象的类与脚本的基类之一匹配，则Object.set_script扩展该对象。

trans-unit.source: The persistent option is used when packing node to PackedScene and saving to file. Non-persistent groups aren’t stored.
trans-unit.target: 将节点打包到PackedScene并保存到文件时，将使用 persistent 选项。不存储非持久性组。

trans-unit.source: The prop_idx argument used to query node property data in other get_node_property_* methods in the interval [0, get_node_property_count() - 1].
trans-unit.target: 所述 prop_idx 在其它用于查询节点属性数据参数 get_node_property_* 在间隔方法 [0, get_node_property_count() - 1] 。

trans-unit.source: The start_mode is usually START_MODE_BEGIN_SEQUENCE, unless you have used the STEP_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 该 start_mode 通常是START_MODE_BEGIN_SEQUENCE，除非你已经使用了STEP_ *常量。

trans-unit.source: The texture’s scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 该 texture 的比例因子。

trans-unit.source: The value property comes from Range. See Range.value, Range.min_value, Range.max_value.
trans-unit.target: 该 value 属性来源于范围。请参见Range.value，Range.min_value，Range.max_value。

trans-unit.source: The AR/VR Server is the heart of our AR/VR solution and handles all the processing.
trans-unit.target: AR/VR服务器是我们AR/VR解决方案的核心,处理所有的处理工作。

trans-unit.source: The ARVR Anchor point is a spatial node that maps a real world location identified by the AR platform to a position within the game world. For example, as long as plane detection in ARKit is on, ARKit will identify and update the position of planes (tables, floors, etc) and create anchors for them.
trans-unit.target: ARVR锚点是一个空间节点,它将AR平台识别的现实世界位置映射到游戏世界中的位置。例如,只要ARKit中的平面检测开启,ARKit就会识别并更新平面(桌子、地板等)的位置,并为其创建锚点。

trans-unit.source: The ARVRController and ARVRAnchor both consume objects of this type and should be the objects you use in game. The positional trackers are just the under the hood objects that make this all work and are mostly exposed so GDNative based interfaces can interact with them.
trans-unit.target: ARVRController和ARVRAnchor都消耗了这种类型的对象,应该是你在游戏中使用的对象。位置跟踪器只是使这一切得以实现的底层对象,而且主要是暴露出来的,所以基于GDNative的接口可以与它们交互。

trans-unit.source: The AtlasTexture’s used region.
trans-unit.target: AtlasTexture的使用区域。

trans-unit.source: The CSG base class.
trans-unit.target: CSG基类。

trans-unit.source: The Camera2D’s anchor point. See ANCHOR_MODE_* constants.
trans-unit.target: Camera2D的锚点。请参见 ANCHOR_MODE_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: The Editor’s popup dialog for creating new Script files.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器的弹出对话框，用于创建新的脚本文件。

trans-unit.source: The GeometryInstance’s max LOD distance.
trans-unit.target: GeometryInstance的最大LOD距离。

trans-unit.source: The GeometryInstance’s max LOD margin.
trans-unit.target: GeometryInstance的最大LOD余量。

trans-unit.source: The GeometryInstance’s min LOD distance.
trans-unit.target: GeometryInstance的最小LOD距离。

trans-unit.source: The GeometryInstance’s min LOD margin.
trans-unit.target: GeometryInstance的最小LOD余量。

trans-unit.source: The IP used when creating a server. This is set to the wildcard * by default, which binds to all available interfaces. The given IP needs to be in IPv4 or IPv6 address format, for example: 192.168.1.1.
trans-unit.target: 创建服务器时使用的IP。默认情况下，它设置为通配符 * ，该通配符*绑定到所有可用接口。指定的IP必须采用IPv4或IPv6地址格式，例如： 192.168.1.1 。

trans-unit.source: The InstancePlaceholder does not have a transform. This causes any child nodes to be positioned relatively to the Viewport from point (0,0), rather than their parent as displayed in the editor. Replacing the placeholder with a scene with a transform will transform children relatively to their parent again.
trans-unit.target: InstancePlaceholder没有变换。这将导致任何子节点从点(0,0)开始相对于视口定位,而不是编辑器中显示的父节点。将占位符替换为具有变换功能的场景,将使子节点再次相对于其父节点进行变换。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript singleton is implemented only in HTML5 export. It’s used to access the browser’s JavaScript context. This allows interaction with embedding pages or calling third-party JavaScript APIs.
trans-unit.target: 仅在HTML5导出中实现JavaScript单例。它用于访问浏览器的JavaScript上下文。这允许与嵌入页面进行交互或调用第三方JavaScript API。

trans-unit.source: The Light2D’s Color.
trans-unit.target: Light2D的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The Light2D’s energy value. The larger the value, the stronger the light.
trans-unit.target: Light2D的能量值。值越大，光线越强。

trans-unit.source: The Light2D’s mode. See MODE_* constants for values.
trans-unit.target: Light2D的模式。有关值，请参见MODE_ *常量。

trans-unit.source: The LightOccluder2D’s light mask. The LightOccluder2D will cast shadows only from Light2D(s) that have the same light mask(s).
trans-unit.target: LightOccluder2D的光罩。LightOccluder2D将仅从具有相同光罩的Light2D投射阴影。

trans-unit.source: The MeshDataTool provides access to individual vertices in a Mesh. It allows users to read and edit vertex data of meshes. It also creates an array of faces and edges.
trans-unit.target: MeshDataTool提供对Mesh中各个顶点的访问。它允许用户读取和编辑网格的顶点数据。它还创建了一组面和边。

trans-unit.source: The NaN values are used to identify undefined or non-representable values for floating-point elements, such as the square root of negative numbers or the result of 0/0.
trans-unit.target: NaN值用于识别浮点元素的未定义值或不可代表值,如负数的平方根或0/0的结果。

trans-unit.source: The Normal state’s texture is required. Others are optional.
trans-unit.target: 正常状态的纹理是必需的。其他是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The ParallaxBackground’s scroll value. Calculated automatically when using a Camera2D, but can be used to manually manage scrolling when no camera is present.
trans-unit.target: ParallaxBackground的滚动值。使用Camera2D时自动计算，但是当不存在相机时可用于手动管理滚动。

trans-unit.source: The ParallaxLayer’s Texture mirroring. Useful for creating an infinite scrolling background. If an axis is set to 0 the Texture will not be mirrored. Default value: (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: ParallaxLayer的纹理镜像。用于创建无限滚动背景。如果将轴设置为 0 ,则纹理将不会被镜像。默认值： (0, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: The ParallaxLayer’s offset relative to the parent ParallaxBackground’s ParallaxBackground.scroll_offset.
trans-unit.target: 相对于父级ParallaxBackground的ParallaxBackground.scroll_offset的ParallaxLayer的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The ProceduralSky is updated on the CPU after the parameters change and stored in a texture and then displayed as a background in the scene. This makes it relatively unsuitable for realtime updates during gameplay. But with a small texture size it is still feasible to update relatively frequently because it is updated on a background thread when multi-threading is available.
trans-unit.target: ProceduralSky在参数变化后会在CPU上更新,并存储在贴图中,然后作为场景中的背景显示。这使得它相对不适合在游戏过程中进行实时更新。但是在贴图尺寸较小的情况下,由于在多线程时是在后台线程上更新,所以相对来说更新频率还是可行的。

trans-unit.source: The RID type is used to access the unique integer ID of a resource. They are opaque, so they do not grant access to the associated resource by themselves. They are used by and with the low-level Server classes such as VisualServer.
trans-unit.target: RID类型用于访问资源的唯一整数ID。它们是不透明的，因此它们自己不会授予对关联资源的访问权限。它们由低级服务器类（例如VisualServer）使用。

trans-unit.source: The StreamTexture’s filepath to a .stex file.
trans-unit.target: .stex文件的StreamTexture的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The TileMap orientation mode. Uses MODE_* constants. Default value: MODE_SQUARE.
trans-unit.target: TileMap 方向模式。使用 MODE_*常量。默认值。MODE_SQUARE。

trans-unit.source: The TileMap’s cell size.
trans-unit.target: TileMap的像元大小。

trans-unit.source: The TileMap’s quadrant size. Optimizes drawing by batching, using chunks of this size. Default value: 16.
trans-unit.target: TileMap的象限大小。使用此大小的块，通过分批优化图形。默认值：16

trans-unit.source: The VisibilityEnabler will disable RigidBody and AnimationPlayer nodes when they are not visible. It will only affect other nodes within the same scene as the VisibilityEnabler itself.
trans-unit.target: 当VisibilityEnabler 节点不可见时，它将禁用RigidBody和AnimationPlayer节点。它只会影响与VisibilityEnabler本身在同一场景中的其他节点。

trans-unit.source: The VisibilityEnabler2D will disable RigidBody2D, AnimationPlayer, and other nodes when they are not visible. It will only affect other nodes within the same scene as the VisibilityEnabler2D itself.
trans-unit.target: 当VisibilityEnabler2D 不可见时，它将禁用RigidBody2D，AnimationPlayer和其他节点。它只会影响与VisibilityEnabler2D本身相同场景中的其他节点。

trans-unit.source: The VisibilityNotifier detects when it is visible on the screen. It also notifies when its bounding rectangle enters or exits the screen or a Camera’s view.
trans-unit.target: VisibilityNotifier检测何时在屏幕上可见。它还会通知其边界矩形何时进入或退出屏幕或相机的视图。

trans-unit.source: The VisibilityNotifier’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: VisibilityNotifier的边界框。

trans-unit.source: The VisibilityNotifier2D detects when it is visible on the screen. It also notifies when its bounding rectangle enters or exits the screen or a viewport.
trans-unit.target: VisibilityNotifier2D检测它在屏幕上何时可见。当它的边界矩形进入或退出屏幕或视口时,它也会发出通知。

trans-unit.source: The VisibilityNotifier2D’s bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: VisibilityNotifier2D的边界矩形。

trans-unit.source: The World’s Environment.
trans-unit.target: 世界的环境。

trans-unit.source: The World’s fallback_environment will be used if the World’s Environment fails or is missing.
trans-unit.target: 如果世界环境失败或丢失，将使用世界的fallback_environment 。

trans-unit.source: The World’s physics direct space state, used for making various queries. Might be used only during _physics_process.
trans-unit.target: 世界物理直接空间状态，用于进行各种查询。只能在 _physics_process 期间使用。

trans-unit.source: The World’s physics space.
trans-unit.target: 世界的物理空间。

trans-unit.source: The World’s visual scenario.
trans-unit.target: 世界的视觉场景。

trans-unit.source: The X axis of 2x2 basis matrix containing 2 Vector2s as its columns: X axis and Y axis. These vectors can be interpreted as the basis vectors of local coordinate system traveling with the object.
trans-unit.target: 2x2基本矩阵的X轴，其中包含2个Vector2 s作为其列：X轴和Y轴。这些向量可以解释为随对象移动的局部坐标系的基本向量。

trans-unit.source: The Y axis of 2x2 basis matrix containing 2 Vector2s as its columns: X axis and Y axis. These vectors can be interpreted as the basis vectors of local coordinate system traveling with the object.
trans-unit.target: 2x2基本矩阵的Y轴，其中包含2个Vector2 s作为其列：X轴和Y轴。这些向量可以解释为随对象移动的局部坐标系的基本向量。

trans-unit.source: The above code will create a SpinBox, disable context menu on it and set the text alignment to right.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码将创建一个SpinBox，在其上禁用上下文菜单，并将文本对齐方式设置为右侧。

trans-unit.source: The action’s name. Actions are accessed via this String.
trans-unit.target: 动作的名称。通过此String访问操作。

trans-unit.source: The actual shape owned by this collision shape.
trans-unit.target: 这个碰撞形状所拥有的实际形状。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm used for diffuse light scattering. See DiffuseMode.
trans-unit.target: 用于漫射光散射的算法。参见DiffuseMode。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of all tabs in the tab container. See the ALIGN_* constants for details.
trans-unit.target: 选项卡容器中所有选项卡的对齐方式。有关详细信息，请参见 ALIGN_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of all tabs. See enum TabAlign constants for details.
trans-unit.target: 所有标签的对齐方式。有关详细信息，请参见枚举 TabAlign 常量。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the container’s children (must be one of ALIGN_BEGIN, ALIGN_CENTER, or ALIGN_END).
trans-unit.target: 容器的子代的对齐方式（必须是ALIGN_BEGIN，ALIGN_CENTER或ALIGN_END中的一种）。

trans-unit.source: The amount of columns.
trans-unit.target: 列的数量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping inside the slider limits.
trans-unit.target: 滑块内部的阻尼量限制。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping of the rotation across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 在与滑块正交的轴上旋转的阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping of the rotation in the limits.
trans-unit.target: 在极限中旋转的阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping of the rotation when the limit is surpassed.
trans-unit.target: 超越极限时的旋转阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping that happens at the x-motion.
trans-unit.target: 发生在x动处的阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping that happens at the y-motion.
trans-unit.target: y运动时发生的阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping that happens at the z-motion.
trans-unit.target: 在z动发生的阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping that happens once the limit defined by linear_limit/lower_distance and linear_limit/upper_distance is surpassed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦超过由linear_limit / lower_distance和linear_limit / upper_distance定义的限制，发生的阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of damping when movement is across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 当运动穿过与滑块正交的轴时的阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution inside the slider limits.
trans-unit.target: 在滑块限额内的归还金额。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution of the rotation across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 在与滑块正交的轴上的旋转恢复量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution of the rotation in the limits.
trans-unit.target: 在极限的旋转的恢复量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution of the rotation when the limit is surpassed.
trans-unit.target: 当超过极限时,旋转的恢复量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution on the x-axis movement The lower, the more momentum gets lost.
trans-unit.target: X轴运动的还原量 越低,失去的动量越多。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution on the y-axis movement The lower, the more momentum gets lost.
trans-unit.target: y轴运动的还原量 越低,动量损失越大。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution on the z-axis movement The lower, the more momentum gets lost.
trans-unit.target: z轴运动的还原量,越低,失去的动量越多。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution once the limits are surpassed. The lower, the more velocity-energy gets lost.
trans-unit.target: 一旦超过极限,恢复的数量。越低,速度能量损失越多。

trans-unit.source: The amount of restitution when movement is across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 当运动跨过与滑块正交的轴时的还原量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotational damping across the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: X轴上的旋转阻尼量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotational damping across the y-axis. The lower, the more dampening occurs.
trans-unit.target: 橫跨Y軸的旋轉阻尼量。越低,阻尼越大。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotational damping across the z-axis. The lower, the more dampening occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在Z轴上的旋转阻尼量。越低,阻尼越大。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotational restitution across the x-axis. The lower, the more restitution occurs.
trans-unit.target: X轴上的旋转还原量。越低,还原量越大。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotational restitution across the y-axis. The lower, the more restitution occurs.
trans-unit.target: 橫跨Y軸的旋轉歸位量。越低,发生的还原量越大。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotational restitution across the z-axis. The lower, the more restitution occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在Z轴上的旋转还原量。越低,还原量越大。

trans-unit.source: The amount of to blend light and albedo color when rendering rim effect. If 0 the light color is used, while 1 means albedo color is used. An intermediate value generally works best.
trans-unit.target: 渲染边缘效果时混合浅色和反照率颜色的数量。如果为 0 ，则使用浅色，而 1 表示使用反照率颜色。中间值通常效果最好。

trans-unit.source: The amount of voices in the effect.
trans-unit.target: 效果中的声音数量。

trans-unit.source: The anchor’s id. You can set this before the anchor itself exists. The first anchor gets an id of 1, the second an id of 2, etc. When anchors get removed, the engine can then assign the corresponding id to new anchors. The most common situation where anchors ‘disappear’ is when the AR server identifies that two anchors represent different parts of the same plane and merges them.
trans-unit.target: 锚的ID。您可以在锚点本身存在之前进行设置。第一个锚的ID为 1 ，第二个ID的ID为 2 ，依此类推。当删除锚时，引擎可以将相应的ID分配给新的锚。锚点“消失”的最常见情况是AR服务器识别出两个锚点代表同一平面的不同部分并合并它们。

trans-unit.source: The angle in which the audio reaches cameras undampened.
trans-unit.target: 音频到达摄像机的角度未被减弱。

trans-unit.source: The animation speed is multiplied by this value.
trans-unit.target: 动画速度乘以此值。

trans-unit.source: The animation step value.
trans-unit.target: 动画步骤值。

trans-unit.source: The animation’s speed in frames per second.
trans-unit.target: 动画的速度，以每秒帧数为单位。

trans-unit.source: The area covered by the BackBufferCopy. Only used if copy_mode is COPY_MODE_RECT.
trans-unit.target: BackBufferCopy覆盖的区域。仅在copy_mode为COPY_MODE_RECT时使用。

trans-unit.source: The area’s gravity intensity (ranges from -1024 to 1024). This value multiplies the gravity vector. This is useful to alter the force of gravity without altering its direction.
trans-unit.target: 该区域的重力强度（范围从-1024到1024）。该值乘以重力矢量。这对改变重力而不改变其方向很有用。

trans-unit.source: The area’s gravity vector (not normalized). If gravity is a point (see gravity_point), this will be the point of attraction.
trans-unit.target: 区域的重力向量（未规范化）。如果引力是一个点（请参见gravity_point），则将是引力点。

trans-unit.source: The area’s gravity vector (not normalized). If gravity is a point (see gravity_point), this will be the point of attraction.
trans-unit.target: 区域的重力向量（未规范化）。如果引力是一个点（请参见gravity_point），则将是引力点。

trans-unit.source: The area’s physics layer(s). Collidable objects can exist in any of 32 different layers. A contact is detected if object A is in any of the layers that object B scans, or object B is in any layers that object A scans. See also collision_mask.
trans-unit.target: 该区域的物理层。可碰撞的对象可以存在于32个不同的层中的任何一个层中。如果对象A在对象B扫描的任何层中，或者对象B在对象A扫描的任何层中，则检测到接触。另请参阅crash_mask。

trans-unit.source: The area’s physics layer(s). Collidable objects can exist in any of 32 different layers. A contact is detected if object A is in any of the layers that object B scans, or object B is in any layers that object A scans. See also collision_mask.
trans-unit.target: 该区域的物理层。可碰撞的对象可以存在于32个不同的层中的任何一个层中。如果对象A在对象B扫描的任何层中，或者对象B在对象A扫描的任何层中，则检测到接触。另请参阅crash_mask。

trans-unit.source: The area’s priority. Higher priority areas are processed first. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 该地区的优先事项。优先级较高的区域将首先处理。默认值：0

trans-unit.source: The arguments are used in the given order and separated by a space, so OS.execute('ping', ['-w', '3', 'godotengine.org'], false) will resolve to ping -w 3 godotengine.org in the system’s shell.
trans-unit.target: 参数按给定顺序使用，并以空格分隔，因此 OS.execute('ping', ['-w', '3', 'godotengine.org'], false) 将解析为 ping -w 3 godotengine.org 在系统的外壳中。

trans-unit.source: The array of points that make up the ConcavePolygonShape2D’s line segments.
trans-unit.target: 组成 ConcavePolygonShape2D 的线段的点的阵列。

trans-unit.source: The assigned MeshLibrary.
trans-unit.target: 分配的MeshLibrary。

trans-unit.source: The assigned TileSet.
trans-unit.target: 分配的TileSet。

trans-unit.target: append_bbcode的分配版本。清除标签栈并插入新内容。如果成功解析 bbcode ,则返回@ GlobalScope.OK。

trans-unit.source: The axis to lock during fov/size adjustments. Can be either KEEP_WIDTH or KEEP_HEIGHT.
trans-unit.target: 在fov / 尺寸调整期间要锁定的轴。可以是KEEP_WIDTH或KEEP_HEIGHT。

trans-unit.target: 基础动画添加到

trans-unit.target: PanoramaSky和ProceduralSky的基类。

trans-unit.target: 基础是一个矩阵，其中包含3个Vector3作为其列：X轴，Y轴和Z轴。这些向量可以解释为随对象移动的局部坐标系的基本向量。

trans-unit.target: 基本矩阵的y向量。

trans-unit.target: 基本矩阵的z向量。

trans-unit.target: 混合空间的X和Y轴对于点位置的下限。参见add_blend_point。

trans-unit.target: 混合空间的轴针对点位置的下限。参见add_blend_point。

trans-unit.target: 实体B的初始锚位置由关节的原点和沿关节y轴（沿凹槽）的局部偏移initial_offset定义。默认值： 25

trans-unit.source: The body bounciness.

trans-unit.target: 车身摩擦力,从0(无摩擦)到1(全摩擦)。

trans-unit.target: 来自MODE_*枚举的主体模式。模式包括:MODE_STATIC、MODE_KINEMATIC、MODE_RIGID和MODE_CHARACTER。MODE_STATIC、MODE_KINEMATIC、MODE_RIGID和MODE_CHARACTER。

trans-unit.source: The body’s bounciness. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 身体的弹跳。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.target: 身体的弹跳。值的范围从 0 （无反弹）到 1 （全反弹）。

trans-unit.source: The body’s friction, from 0 (frictionless) to 1 (max friction).

trans-unit.target: 身体的摩擦。值的范围从 0 （无摩擦）到 1 （最大摩擦）。默认值： 1 。

trans-unit.target: 身体的摩擦。值的范围从 0 （无摩擦）到 1 （全摩擦）。

trans-unit.source: The body’s linear damp. Default value: -1, cannot be less than -1. If this value is different from -1, any linear damp derived from the world or areas will be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 身体的线性阻尼。默认值：-1，不能小于-1。如果此值与-1不同，则将覆盖来自世界或区域的任何线性阻尼。

trans-unit.source: The body’s linear velocity.
trans-unit.target: 身体的线速度。

trans-unit.source: The body’s linear velocity. Can be used sporadically, but DON’T SET THIS IN EVERY FRAME, because physics may run in another thread and runs at a different granularity. Use _integrate_forces as your process loop for precise control of the body state.
trans-unit.target: 身体的线速度。可以偶尔使用，但不要在每个帧中都设置此选项，因为物理可能会在另一个线程中运行并且以不同的粒度运行。使用_integrate_forces作为过程循环来精确控制主体状态。

trans-unit.source: The body’s mass.
trans-unit.target: 身体的质量。

trans-unit.target: 身体的质量。默认值： 1 。

trans-unit.source: The body’s mode. See MODE_* constants. Default value: MODE_RIGID.
trans-unit.target: 身体的模式。请参见 MODE_* 常量。默认值：MODE_RIGID。

trans-unit.source: The body’s moment of inertia. This is like mass, but for rotation: it determines how much torque it takes to rotate the body. The moment of inertia is usually computed automatically from the mass and the shapes, but this function allows you to set a custom value. Set 0 (or negative) inertia to return to automatically computing it.
trans-unit.target: 身体的惯性矩。这就像质量，但要旋转：它确定旋转身体需要多少扭矩。通常根据质量和形状自动计算出惯性矩，但是此功能允许您设置自定义值。设置为0（或负）的惯性返回到自动计算。

trans-unit.source: The body’s rotational velocity.
trans-unit.target: 人体的旋转速度。

trans-unit.source: The body’s total applied force.
trans-unit.target: 身体的总作用力。

trans-unit.source: The body’s total applied torque.
trans-unit.target: 车身的总施加扭矩。

trans-unit.source: The body’s transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 人体的变换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The body’s weight based on its mass and the “Default Gravity” value in “Project > Project Settings > Physics > 2d”.
trans-unit.target: 根据体重和“项目”>“项目设置”>“物理”>“ 2d”中的“默认重力”值，计算体重。

trans-unit.source: The body’s weight based on its mass and the global 3D gravity. Global values are set in “Project > Project Settings > Physics > 3d”.
trans-unit.target: 人体的重量取决于其质量和全局3D重力。全局值在“项目>项目设置>物理> 3d”中设置。

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin for the contents of this style box. Increasing this value reduces the space available to the contents from the bottom.

trans-unit.target: 按钮处于按下状态的纹理。

trans-unit.target: 按钮的可见模式。请参见 VISIBILITY_* 常量。

trans-unit.target: 计算出的光照数据。

trans-unit.source: The callback method must use only 1 argument which will be called with ‘userdata’.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法必须仅使用1个参数，该参数将与“ userdata”一起调用。

trans-unit.source: The camera’s field of view angle (in degrees). Only applicable in perspective mode. Since keep_aspect locks one axis, fov sets the other axis’ field of view angle.
trans-unit.target: 相机的视场角（以度为单位）。仅适用于透视模式。由于keep_aspect锁定一个轴， fov 设置视角的另一轴线字段。

trans-unit.source: The camera’s projection mode. In PROJECTION_PERSPECTIVE mode, objects’ z-distance from the camera’s local space scales their perceived size.
trans-unit.target: 相机的投影模式。在PROJECTION_PERSPECTIVE模式下，对象与相机局部空间的z距离将缩放其感知的大小。

trans-unit.source: The camera’s size measured as 1/2 the width or height. Only applicable in orthogonal mode. Since keep_aspect locks on axis, size sets the other axis’ size length.
trans-unit.target: 相机的尺寸为宽度或高度的1/2。仅适用于正交模式。由于keep_aspect锁定在轴上，因此 size 设置了另一个轴的尺寸长度。

trans-unit.source: The camera’s zoom relative to the viewport. Values larger than Vector2(1, 1) zoom out and smaller values zoom in. For an example, use Vector2(0.5, 0.5) for a 2x zoom in, and Vector2(4, 4) for a 4x zoom out.
trans-unit.target: 相机相对于视口的缩放。大于 Vector2(1, 1) 值将缩小，而小于Vector2（1，1）的值将放大。例如，使用 Vector2(0.5, 0.5) 进行2倍放大，使用Vector2（ Vector2(4, 4) 进行4x缩小。

trans-unit.source: The canvas transform of the viewport, useful for changing the on-screen positions of all child CanvasItems. This is relative to the global canvas transform of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 视口的画布转换，对于更改所有子CanvasItem的屏幕位置很有用。这是相对于视口的全局画布变换。

trans-unit.target: 左下角的圆角半径。当设置为0时,角不为圆形。

trans-unit.source: The corner radius of the bottom right corner. When set to 0 the corner is not rounded.
trans-unit.target: 右下角的圆角半径。当设置为0时,角不为圆形。

trans-unit.source: The corner radius of the top left corner. When set to 0 the corner is not rounded.
trans-unit.target: 左上角的圆角半径。当设置为0时,角不为圆形。

trans-unit.source: The corner radius of the top right corner. When set to 0 the corner is not rounded.
trans-unit.target: 右上角的圆角半径。当设置为0时,角不为圆形。

trans-unit.source: The cube’s UV layout is arranged in a 3×2 layout that allows texturing each face individually. To apply the same texture on all faces, change the material’s UV property to Vector3(3, 2, 1).
trans-unit.target: 立方体的UV布局以3×2布局进行排列，该布局允许分别对每个面进行纹理化。要在所有面上应用相同的纹理，请将材质的UV属性更改为 Vector3(3, 2, 1) 。

trans-unit.source: The culling mask that describes which 3D render layers are rendered by this camera.
trans-unit.target: 剔除掩码,用于描述此摄像机渲染哪些 3D 渲染层。

trans-unit.source: The current AudioStream.
trans-unit.target: 当前的AudioStream。

trans-unit.source: The current Material of the primitive mesh.
trans-unit.target: 基本体网格的当前“ 材质 ”。

trans-unit.source: The current animation from the frames resource. If this value changes, the frame counter is reset.
trans-unit.target: 来自 frames 资源的当前动画。如果此值更改，则将重置 frame 计数器。

trans-unit.source: The current drawing color.
trans-unit.target: 当前图纸的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The current horizontal scroll value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的水平滚动值。

trans-unit.source: The current position of the stream, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 流的当前位置,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The current scene.
trans-unit.target: 目前的场景。

trans-unit.source: The current screen index (starting from 0).
trans-unit.target: 当前屏幕的索引(从0开始)。

trans-unit.source: The current screen orientation.
trans-unit.target: 当前的屏幕方向。

trans-unit.source: The current tab index. When set, this index’s Control node’s visible property is set to true and all others are set to false.
trans-unit.target: 当前的标签索引。设置后，此索引的Control节点的 visible 属性设置为 true ，所有其他属性设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The current vertical scroll value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的垂直滚动值。

trans-unit.source: The current working directory of the file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 文件对话框的当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The current zoom value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的缩放值。

trans-unit.source: The currently occupied directory.
trans-unit.target: 当前占用的目录。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected color.
trans-unit.target: 当前选择的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected file of the file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 文件对话框中当前选中的文件。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected file path of the file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 当前选择的文件对话框的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected file.
trans-unit.target: 当前选择的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cursor’s position inside the LineEdit. When set, the text may scroll to accommodate it.
trans-unit.target: 光标在 LineEdit 内的位置。设置后，文本可能会滚动以适应它。

trans-unit.source: The custom Transform2D to be applied to the TileMap’s cells.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义的Transform2D应用于TileMap的单元。

trans-unit.source: The custom Viewport node assigned to the CanvasLayer. If null, uses the default viewport instead.
trans-unit.target: 分配给 CanvasLayer 的自定义视口节点。如果为null，则改用默认视口。

trans-unit.source: The custom Viewport node attached to the Camera2D. If null or not a Viewport, uses the default viewport instead.
trans-unit.target: 附加到 Camera2D 的自定义视口节点。如果为null或不是Viewport，则使用默认视口。

trans-unit.source: The custom World which can be used as 3D environment source.
trans-unit.target: 可以用作3D环境源的自定义世界。

trans-unit.source: The custom World2D which can be used as 2D environment source.
trans-unit.target: 可以用作2D环境源的自定义World2D。

trans-unit.source: The custom minimum height.
trans-unit.target: 定制的最小高度。

trans-unit.source: The cylinder’s height.
trans-unit.target: 圆柱体的高度。

trans-unit.source: The cylinder’s radius.
trans-unit.target: 圆柱体的半径。

trans-unit.source: The damping applied to the spring when relaxing. This value should be between 0.0 (no damping) and 1.0. This value should always be slightly higher than the damping_compression property. For a damping_compression value of 0.3, try a relaxation value of 0.5
trans-unit.target: 放松时弹簧上的阻尼。该值应在0.0（无阻尼）和1.0之间。此值应始终略高于阻尼阻尼属性。对于阻尼压缩值0.3，请尝试松弛值0.5

trans-unit.source: The damping applied to the spring when the spring is being compressed. This value should be between 0.0 (no damping) and 1.0. A value of 0.0 means the car will keep bouncing as the spring keeps its energy. A good value for this is around 0.3 for a normal car, 0.5 for a race car.
trans-unit.target: 當彈簧被壓縮時,施加在彈簧上的阻尼。该值应该在0.0(无阻尼)和1.0之间。0.0的值意味着当弹簧保持其能量时,汽车将继续弹跳。对于普通汽车来说,一个好的数值是0.3左右,对于赛车来说是0.5。

trans-unit.source: The default MultiplayerAPI instance for this SceneTree.
trans-unit.target: 此 SceneTree 的默认MultiplayerAPI实例。

trans-unit.source: The default cursor shape for this control. Useful for Godot plugins and applications or games that use the system’s mouse cursors.
trans-unit.target: 此控件的默认光标形状。对于Godot插件和使用系统鼠标光标的应用程序或游戏很有用。

trans-unit.source: The default time in which to blend animations. Ranges from 0 to 4096 with 0.01 precision. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 混合动画的默认时间。范围从0到4096，精度为0.01。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which the tracker rumbles. Ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 with precision .01.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪器发出隆隆声的程度。范围从 0.0 到 1.0 ，精度为 .01 。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which the tracker rumbles. Ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 with precision .01. If changed, updates ARVRPositionalTracker.rumble accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪器发出隆隆声的程度。范围从 0.0 到 1.0 ，精度为 .01 。如果更改，则相应地更新ARVRPositionalTracker.rumble。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which this area applies reverb to its associated audio. Ranges from 0 to 1 with 0.1 precision.
trans-unit.target: 此区域将混响应用于其关联音频的程度。范围从 0 到 1 ，精度为 0.1 。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which this area’s reverb is a uniform effect. Ranges from 0 to 1 with 0.1 precision.
trans-unit.target: 该区域的混响程度是统一的效果。范围从 0 到 1 ，精度为 0.1 。

trans-unit.source: The description (desc) is shown in some router UIs and can be used to point out which application added the mapping, and the lifetime of the mapping can be limited by duration. However, some routers are incompatible with one or both of these, so use with caution and add fallback logic in case of errors to retry without them if in doubt.
trans-unit.target: 描述（ desc ）在某些路由器UI中显示，可用于指出哪个应用程序添加了映射，并且映射的生存期可能受 duration 限制。但是，某些路由器与这两者之一或两者都不兼容，因此请谨慎使用并添加后备逻辑，以防万一出现错误时在没有疑问的情况下重试。

trans-unit.source: The desired frames per second. If the hardware cannot keep up, this setting may not be respected. Defaults to 0, which indicates no limit.
trans-unit.target: 所需的每秒帧数。如果硬件无法跟上,则可能不遵守此设置。默认值为0,表示没有限制。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions of the grid’s cells.
trans-unit.target: 网格单元的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The direction difference in radians between vector points. This value is only used if joint mode is set to LINE_JOINT_SHARP.
trans-unit.target: 矢量点之间的弧度方向差。仅当 joint mode 设置为LINE_JOINT_SHARP时才使用此值。

trans-unit.source: The direction in which the front of the texture faces.
trans-unit.target: 纹理正面朝向的方向。

trans-unit.source: The direction of the sun using polar coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 用极坐标表示太阳的方向。

trans-unit.source: The directional shadow’s size in pixels. Higher values will result in sharper shadows, at the cost of performance.
trans-unit.target: 定向阴影的大小（以像素为单位）。较高的值将导致更锐利的阴影，但会降低性能。

trans-unit.source: The displayed animation frame’s index.
trans-unit.target: 显示的动画帧的索引。

trans-unit.source: The distance along the path as a number in the range 0.0 (for the first vertex) to 1.0 (for the last). This is just another way of expressing the offset within the path, as the offset supplied is multiplied internally by the path’s length.
trans-unit.target: 沿路径的距离，范围为0.0（对于第一个顶点）到1.0（对于最后一个顶点）。这只是表示路径内偏移量的另一种方法，因为所提供的偏移量在内部乘以路径的长度。

trans-unit.source: The distance along the path in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 沿着路径的距离,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the display and the lenses inside of the device in centimeters.
trans-unit.target: 显示屏与设备内部镜头之间的距离,单位为厘米。

trans-unit.source: The distance from camera to shadow split 1. Relative to directional_shadow_max_distance. Only used when directional_shadow_mode is one of the SHADOW_PARALLEL_*_SPLITS constants.
trans-unit.target: 相机到阴影分裂的距离1.相对于direction_shadow_max_distance。仅在directional_shadow_mode是 SHADOW_PARALLEL_*_SPLITS 常量之一时使用。

trans-unit.source: The distance from shadow split 1 to split 2. Relative to directional_shadow_max_distance. Only used when directional_shadow_mode is SHADOW_PARALLEL_3_SPLITS or SHADOW_PARALLEL_4_SPLITS.
trans-unit.target: 从阴影分割1到分割2的距离。相对于direction_shadow_max_distance。仅在directional_shadow_mode为 SHADOW_PARALLEL_3_SPLITS 或 SHADOW_PARALLEL_4_SPLITS 时使用。

trans-unit.source: The distance from shadow split 2 to split 3. Relative to directional_shadow_max_distance. Only used when directional_shadow_mode is SHADOW_PARALLEL_4_SPLITS.
trans-unit.target: 阴影分割2到分割3的距离。相对于direction_shadow_max_distance。仅在directional_shadow_mode为 SHADOW_PARALLEL_4_SPLITS 时使用。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the first vertex, considering 0.0 as the first vertex and 1.0 as the last. This is just another way of expressing the offset within the path, as the offset supplied is multiplied internally by the path’s length.
trans-unit.target: 与第一个顶点的距离，以0.0为第一个顶点，以1.0为最后一个顶点。这只是表示路径内偏移量的另一种方法，因为所提供的偏移量在内部乘以路径的长度。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the first vertex, measured in 3D units along the path. This sets this node’s position to a point within the path.
trans-unit.target: 距第一顶点的距离，沿路径以3D单位度量。这会将节点的位置设置为路径内的一个点。

trans-unit.source: The distance in meters between two adjacent cached points. Changing it forces the cache to be recomputed the next time the get_baked_points or get_baked_length function is called. The smaller the distance, the more points in the cache and the more memory it will consume, so use with care.
trans-unit.target: 两个相邻的缓存点之间的距离（以米为单位）。对其进行更改会在下次调用get_baked_points或get_baked_length函数时强制重新计算缓存。距离越短，缓存中的点越多，消耗的内存就越多，因此请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: The distance in pixels between two adjacent cached points. Changing it forces the cache to be recomputed the next time the get_baked_points or get_baked_length function is called. The smaller the distance, the more points in the cache and the more memory it will consume, so use with care.
trans-unit.target: 两个相邻的缓存点之间的像素距离。对其进行更改会在下次调用get_baked_points或get_baked_length函数时强制重新计算缓存。距离越短，缓存中的点越多，消耗的内存就越多，因此请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: The distance the moving object traveled before collision.
trans-unit.target: 运动物体在碰撞前移动的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance to the far culling boundary for this Camera relative to its local z-axis.
trans-unit.target: 相对于本地Z轴而言,该相机到远端裁剪边界的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance to the near culling boundary for this Camera relative to its local z-axis.
trans-unit.target: 相对于本地Z轴而言,该相机到近裁边界的距离。

trans-unit.source: The drop mode as an OR combination of flags. See DROP_MODE_* constants. Once dropping is done, reverts to DROP_MODE_DISABLED. Setting this during Control.can_drop_data is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 下降模式是标志的“或”组合。请参见 DROP_MODE_* 常量。删除完成后，将恢复为DROP_MODE_DISABLED。建议在Control.can_drop_data期间进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The ease with which the joint starts to twist. If it’s too low, it takes more force to start twisting the joint.
trans-unit.target: 关节开始扭曲的难易程度。如果它太低，则需要更多的力量来开始扭转关节。

trans-unit.source: The effect’s processed signal.
trans-unit.target: 效果的已处理信号。

trans-unit.source: The effect’s raw signal.
trans-unit.target: 效果的原始信号。

trans-unit.source: The embedded audio track to play.
trans-unit.target: 要播放的嵌入式音轨。

trans-unit.source: The emitted light’s color. See emission_enabled.
trans-unit.target: 发出的光的颜色。请参阅mission_enabled。

trans-unit.source: The emitted light’s strength. See emission_enabled.
trans-unit.target: 发出的光的强度。请参阅mission_enabled。

trans-unit.source: The engine can save resources when you do it from the editor, or when you use the ResourceSaver singleton. This is accomplished thanks to multiple ResourceFormatSavers, each handling its own format and called automatically by the engine.
trans-unit.target: 从编辑器或使用ResourceSaver单例时，引擎可以节省资源。这要归功于多个ResourceFormatSaver，它们每个处理自己的格式并由引擎自动调用。

trans-unit.source: The error message if JSON source was not successfully parsed. See @GlobalScope ERR_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功解析JSON源，则会显示错误消息。请参见@GlobalScope ERR_ *常量。

trans-unit.source: The error type if JSON source was not successfully parsed. See @GlobalScope ERR_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功解析JSON源，则为错误类型。请参见@GlobalScope ERR_ *常量。

trans-unit.source: The event’s device ID.
trans-unit.target: 事件的设备ID。

trans-unit.source: The exit code passed to the OS when the main loop exits.
trans-unit.target: 主循环退出时传递给OS的退出代码。

trans-unit.source: The extra distance added to the GeometryInstance’s bounding box (AABB) to increase its cull box.
trans-unit.target: 添加到GeometryInstance的边界框（AABB）中的额外距离增加了其剔除框。

trans-unit.source: The fallback font.
trans-unit.target: 后备字体。

trans-unit.source: The falloff factor for point gravity. The greater the value, the faster gravity decreases with distance.
trans-unit.target: 点重力的落差系数。该值越大,重力随距离下降越快。

trans-unit.source: The file system access scope. See enum Access constants.
trans-unit.target: 文件系统访问范围。请参见枚举 Access 常量。

trans-unit.source: The file system path in the address bar.
trans-unit.target: 地址栏中的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: The file to download into. Will output any received file into it.
trans-unit.target: 要下载到的文件。会将收到的任何文件输出到其中。

trans-unit.source: The fill color.
trans-unit.target: 填充颜色。

trans-unit.source: The fill direction. Uses FILL_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 填充方向。使用 FILL_*常量。

trans-unit.source: The first 3 DOF axes are linear axes, which represent translation of Bodies, and the latter 3 DOF axes represent the angular motion. Each axis can be either locked, or limited.
trans-unit.target: 前3个DOF轴是线性轴,代表Body的平移,后3个DOF轴代表角度运动。每个轴可以被锁定,也可以被限制。

trans-unit.source: The first body attached to the joint. Must derive from PhysicsBody2D.
trans-unit.target: 第一身体附着在关节上。必须从PhysicsBody2D派生。

trans-unit.source: The focus access mode for the control (None, Click or All). Only one Control can be focused at the same time, and it will receive keyboard signals.
trans-unit.target: 控件的聚焦访问模式(无、单击或全部)。同一时间只能聚焦一个控件,并且它将接收键盘信号。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to parse an INI-style file from the system, read its contents and store new values in it:
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子显示了如何从系统中解析一个INI风格的文件,读取其内容并在其中存储新的值。

trans-unit.source: The font data.
trans-unit.target: 字体数据。

trans-unit.source: The font hinting mode used by FreeType.
trans-unit.target: FreeType使用的字体提示模式。

trans-unit.source: The font size.
trans-unit.target: 字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The force with which the pinned objects stay in positional relation to each other.
trans-unit.target: 被钉住的物体相互之间保持位置关系的力量。

trans-unit.source: The force with which the pinned objects stay in velocity relation to each other.
trans-unit.target: 被钉住的物体在速度关系上停留的力。

trans-unit.source: The function must take an extra argument that is the control doing the forwarding
trans-unit.target: 该函数必须接受一个额外的参数,即做转发的控件。

trans-unit.source: The function name must be suffixed with _fw
trans-unit.target: 函数名称必须后缀_fw

trans-unit.source: The function to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的功能。

trans-unit.source: The generic 6 degrees of freedom joint can implement a variety of joint-types by locking certain axes’ rotation or translation.
trans-unit.target: 通用的6自由度关节可以通过锁定某些轴的旋转或平移来实现多种关节类型。

trans-unit.source: The given input event’s position, global position and speed will be copied. The resulting relative is a sum of both events. Both events’ modifiers have to be identical.
trans-unit.target: 给定输入事件的位置，全局位置和速度将被复制。结果 relative 是两个事件的总和。这两个事件的修饰符必须相同。

trans-unit.source: The global canvas transform of the viewport. The canvas transform is relative to this.
trans-unit.target: 视口的全局画布变换。画布的变换是相对的。

trans-unit.source: The gradient is drawn through the whole line from start to finish. The default color will not be used if a gradient is set.
trans-unit.target: 渐变从起点到终点贯穿整个线条。如果设置了渐变,则不会使用默认颜色。

trans-unit.source: The gray value is calculated as (r + g + b) / 3.
trans-unit.target: 灰度值计算为 (r + g + b) / 3 。

trans-unit.source: The groove’s length. The groove is from the joint’s origin towards length along the joint’s local y axis. Default value: 50
trans-unit.target: 凹槽的长度。凹槽是从关节的原点到沿着关节的局部y轴的长度。默认值： 50

trans-unit.source: The height at which the camera is placed in relation to the ground (i.e. ARVROrigin node).
trans-unit.target: 相对于地面放置摄像机的高度（即ARVROrigin节点）。

trans-unit.source: The height of the 9-patch’s bottom row. A margin of 16 means the 9-slice’s bottom corners and side will have a height of 16 pixels. You can set all 4 margin values individually to create panels with non-uniform borders.
trans-unit.target: 9补丁底行的高度。边距为16表示9切片的底角和侧面的高度为16像素。您可以分别设置所有4个边距值，以创建边框不一致的面板。

trans-unit.source: The height of the 9-patch’s top row.
trans-unit.target: 9补丁顶行的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the 9-slice’s bottom row. A margin of 16 means the 9-slice’s bottom corners and side will have a height of 16 pixels. You can set all 4 margin values individually to create panels with non-uniform borders.
trans-unit.target: 9切片的底行的高度。边距为16表示9切片的底角和侧面的高度为16像素。您可以分别设置所有4个边距值，以创建边框不一致的面板。

trans-unit.source: The height of the 9-slice’s left column.
trans-unit.target: 9切片的左列的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the 9-slice’s right column.
trans-unit.target: 9个切片的右列的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the 9-slice’s top row.
trans-unit.target: 9片的第一行的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the Light2D. Used with 2D normal mapping.
trans-unit.target: Light2D的高度。与2D法线贴图一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The height of the cylinder.
trans-unit.target: 筒体的高度。

trans-unit.source: The higher the radiance map size, the more detailed the lighting from the Sky will be.
trans-unit.target: 辐射贴图的大小越大，来自天空的照明将越详细。

trans-unit.source: The higher the value, the less the bodies attached to the joint will deform it. The joint applies an opposing force to the bodies, the product of the stiffness multiplied by the size difference from its resting length. Default value: 20
trans-unit.target: 值越高，连接到关节的物体变形的可能性就越小。关节向车身施加相反的力，刚度的乘积乘以距其静止长度的大小差。默认值： 20

trans-unit.source: The higher this value, the more the bond to the pinned partner can flex.
trans-unit.target: 该值越高,与被钉伙伴的结合力越能弯曲。

trans-unit.source: The higher, the faster.
trans-unit.target: 越高,越快。

trans-unit.source: The higher, the stronger.
trans-unit.target: 越高,越强。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal (X) offset of the Camera viewport.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机视窗的水平(X)偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the camera, relative to the drag margins. Default value: 0

trans-unit.source: The main difference between a ConvexPolygonShape2D and a ConcavePolygonShape2D is that a concave polygon assumes it is concave and uses a more complex method of collision detection, and a convex one forces itself to be convex in order to speed up collision detection.
trans-unit.target: ConvexPolygonShape2D和 ConcavePolygonShape2D 之间的主要区别在于，凹面多边形假定其为凹面并使用更复杂的碰撞检测方法，而凸面多边形则将自身强制为凸面以加快碰撞检测。

trans-unit.source: The main difference between a ConvexPolygonShape2D and a ConcavePolygonShape2D is that a concave polygon assumes it is concave and uses a more complex method of collision detection, and a convex one forces itself to be convex in order to speed up collision detection.
trans-unit.target: ConvexPolygonShape2D 和ConcavePolygonShape2D之间的主要区别在于，凹面多边形假定其为凹面并使用更复杂的碰撞检测方法，而凸面多边形则将自身强制为凸面以加快碰撞检测。

trans-unit.source: The main documentation for the site is organized into the following sections:
trans-unit.target: 本网站的主要文件分为以下几个部分:

trans-unit.source: The manner in which a material’s rendering is applied to underlying textures.
trans-unit.target: 将材质的渲染应用于基础纹理的方式。

trans-unit.source: The manner in which material reacts to lighting.

trans-unit.target: 应用于此 CanvasItem 上的纹理的材质。默认值： null 。

trans-unit.target: 整个几何体的材质覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The material’s blend mode. Note that values other than Mix force the object into the transparent pipeline. See BlendMode.
trans-unit.target: 材质的混合模式。请注意，“ Mix 以外的值会强制对象进入透明管道。参见BlendMode。

trans-unit.source: The math constant.
trans-unit.target: 数学常数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of force that can occur, when rotating around x-axis.

trans-unit.source: The maximum contacts to report. Bodies can keep a log of the contacts with other bodies, this is enabled by setting the maximum amount of contacts reported to a number greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 要报告的最大接触量。各机构可以保存与其他机构的联系记录,通过将报告的最大联系数量设置为大于0的数字来启用。

trans-unit.source: The maximum difference between the pivot points on their x-axis before damping happens.
trans-unit.target: 在阻尼发生之前,其X轴上的支点之间的最大差异。

trans-unit.target: 枢轴点的x轴之间的最大差。

trans-unit.source: The maximum force the spring can resist. This value should be higher than a quarter of the RigidBody.mass of the VehicleBody or the spring will not carry the weight of the vehicle. Good results are often obtained by a value that is about 3x to 4x this number.
trans-unit.target: 弹簧可以抵抗的最大力。该值应高于VehicleBody的RigidBody.mass的四分之一，否则弹簧将不会承载车辆的重量。通常通过此值的3倍至4倍来获得良好的结果。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of contacts to report. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 要报告的最大联系人数。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum rotation. only active if angular_limit/enable is true.
trans-unit.target: 最大旋转。仅当angular_limit / enable为 true 时才激活。

trans-unit.source: The minimum rotation in positive direction to break loose and rotate around the z-axis.

trans-unit.source: The minimum rotation. only active if angular_limit/enable is true.

trans-unit.source: The minimum size of the node’s bounding rectangle. If you set it to a value greater than (0, 0), the node’s bounding rectangle will always have at least this size, even if its content is smaller. If it’s set to (0, 0), the node sizes automatically to fit its content, be it a texture or child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 节点边界矩形的最小大小。如果将其设置为大于（0，0）的值，则节点的边界矩形将始终至少具有此大小，即使其内容较小。如果将其设置为（0，0），则节点会自动调整大小以适合其内容，无论是纹理节点还是子节点。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value the curve can reach. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 曲线可以达到的最小值。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: The mode of the light, see CANVAS_LIGHT_MODE_* constants.

trans-unit.source: The most important data type in Godot.
trans-unit.target: Godot中最重要的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constant to return.

trans-unit.source: The name of the current animation, “” if not playing anything. When being set, does not restart the animation. See also play. Default value: "".
trans-unit.target: 当前动画的名称，如果未播放任何内容，则为“”。设置后，不重新启动动画。另请参阅播放。默认值： "" 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file or directory is returned (and not its full path). Once the stream has been fully processed, the method returns an empty String and closes the stream automatically (i.e. list_dir_end would not be mandatory in such a case).
trans-unit.target: 返回文件或目录的名称（而不是其完整路径）。一旦对流进行了完全处理，该方法将返回一个空String并自动关闭该流（即list_dir_end在这种情况下不是强制性的）。

trans-unit.source: The name of the node. This name is unique among the siblings (other child nodes from the same parent). When set to an existing name, the node will be automatically renamed
trans-unit.target: 节点的名称,这个名称在兄弟姐妹(来自同一父节点的其他子节点)中是唯一的。这个名称在兄弟姐妹(来自同一父节点的其他子节点)中是唯一的。当设置为现有的名称时,节点将自动重命名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the referenced function to call on the object, without parentheses or any parameters.
trans-unit.target: 要在对象上调用的引用函数的名称,没有括号或任何参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource. This is an optional identifier.
trans-unit.target: 资源的名称。这是一个可选的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The natural exponential function. It raises the mathematical constant e to the power of s and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 自然指数函数。它将数学常数e提高到 s 的幂并返回。

trans-unit.source: The next vertex’s UV.
trans-unit.target: 下一个顶点的UV。

trans-unit.target: 下一个顶点的法线。

trans-unit.target: 下一个顶点的第二层UV。

trans-unit.source: The next vertex’s tangent (and binormal facing).

trans-unit.source: The node attached to the first side (A) of the joint.
trans-unit.target: 连接到关节第一面(A)的节点。

trans-unit.source: The node attached to the second side (B) of the joint.
trans-unit.target: 连接到关节第二侧(B)的结点。

trans-unit.source: The node from which node path references will travel. Default value: "..".

trans-unit.source: The node from which to relatively access other nodes. Default value: "..".

trans-unit.source: The node ignores the first lines_skipped lines before it starts to display text.

trans-unit.source: The node owner. A node can have any other node as owner (as long as it is a valid parent, grandparent, etc. ascending in the tree). When saving a node (using PackedScene) all the nodes it owns will be saved with it. This allows for the creation of complex SceneTrees, with instancing and subinstancing.
trans-unit.target: 节点所有者。一个节点可以具有任何其他节点作为所有者（只要它是在树中升序的有效父代，祖父母等）。当保存一个节点时（使用PackedScene），它拥有的所有节点都将随之保存。这允许创建复杂的SceneTree S，用实例和subinstancing。

trans-unit.source: The node’s Texture resource.
trans-unit.target: 节点的纹理资源。

trans-unit.source: The node’s global position, relative to the world (usually to the top-left corner of the window).
trans-unit.target: 节点相对于世界的位置（通常位于窗口的左上角）。

trans-unit.source: The node’s offset along the curve.

trans-unit.source: The node’s offset perpendicular to the curve.

trans-unit.source: The node’s path in the scene tree.
trans-unit.target: 场景树中节点的路径。

trans-unit.source: The node’s position, relative to its parent. It corresponds to the rectangle’s top-left corner. The property is not affected by rect_pivot_offset.
trans-unit.target: 节点相对于其父节点的位置。它对应于矩形的左上角。该属性不受rect_pivot_offset的影响。

trans-unit.source: The node’s rotation around its pivot, in degrees. See rect_pivot_offset to change the pivot’s position.
trans-unit.target: 节点围绕其枢轴的旋转（以度为单位）。请参见rect_pivot_offset更改枢轴的位置。

trans-unit.source: The node’s scale, relative to its rect_size. Change this property to scale the node around its rect_pivot_offset.
trans-unit.target: 节点相对于rect_size的比例。更改此属性以围绕其rect_pivot_offset缩放节点。

trans-unit.source: The node’s scale. Unscaled value: (1, 1)
trans-unit.target: 节点的比例。非标度值： (1, 1)

trans-unit.source: The node’s texture resource.
trans-unit.target: 节点的纹理资源。

trans-unit.source: The normal map gives depth to the Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 法线图给Sprite提供了深度。

trans-unit.source: The normal map that will be used if using the default CanvasItemMaterial.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用默认的CanvasItemMaterial，将使用的法线贴图。
